unnormalised: Arrey yaar, another Monday morning, another bug in the code! My team lead, Mr. Sharma, wants it fixed by 5 PM sharp, or else! As if debugging isn't hard enough, the coffee machine decided to konk out. I swear, coding in Java is easier than dealing with this. And don't even get me started on trying to explain to the client why the website decided to display '404: samosas not found'. Seriously considering switching to chai-fueled development; maybe that'll fix things.
normalised: Arrey yaar, another Monday morning, another bug in the code! My team lead, Mister Sharma, wants it fixed by five P-M sharp, or else! As if debugging isn't hard enough, the coffee machine decided to konk out. I swear, coding in Java is easier than dealing with this. And don't even get me started on trying to explain to the client why the website decided to display 'four hundred and four: samosas not found'. Seriously considering switching to chai-fueled development; maybe that'll fix things.
